      • trialNotify

        public void trialNotify​()
        Inform the box that a trial move has been made so it can update the coordinate pairs. If molecule is not null, only coordinate pairs containing that atom are updated.

      • acceptNotify

        public void acceptNotify​()
        Informs the box that the trial was accepted so it will keep the new coordinate pairs.

      • rejectNotify

        public void rejectNotify​()
        Informs the box that the trial was rejected so it will go back to the old coordinate pairs.
